## Summary

Fixed critical issues preventing the Upscayl image enhancement integration from working correctly.

## Issues Fixed

| Issue | Problem | Solution |
|-------|---------|----------|
| Models path | Looked in `resources/bin/models` | Fixed to `resources/models` |
| Scale param | Used `-s` flag | Changed to `-z` |
| Encoding | `UnicodeDecodeError` on output | UTF-8 with Latin1 fallback |
| Paths | Relative path failures | Use absolute paths |
| Default model | `realesrgan-x4plus` missing | Changed to `upscayl-standard-4x` |

## Files Changed

- `src/enhancer.py` - Core fixes
- `src/core/config.py` - Default model
- `.env.app` - Configuration

## Testing

- ✅ Enhancement now works correctly
- ✅ 4x upscaling produces valid output

## Reference

See `docs/bug-report-upscayl-enhancement.md` for full details.

Fixed in commit 3cc21d8.
EOF
\)" --label "bug")
